website_summaries.verdict: Adorable and lifelike design is sure to please little ones, and parents will appreciate the quality construction.
pros: Ultra cute and lovable with a plush exterior that's perfect for cuddles
Walks on a leash, sits, talks, and wags her tail
Touch and voice responsive for a realistic interactive experience
Free app adds another level of entertainment that children won't quickly tire of
Robust design easily withstands enthusiastic handling
cons: A bit costly, but well worth the quality
Leash attaches directly to the toy’s back and isn't removable

website_summaries.verdict: Although this toy may not be appealing to older children, it's a cute option for little kids who appreciate an easy-to-operate toy that's also soft and huggable.
pros: Makes kids feel like they are walking a real dog, thanks to the leash controller
Barks when talked to and sits, walks, and wags
Features soft fur and an adorable facial expression
cons: Falls on the higher end of the price scale
Not as responsive as some other robot dogs, but small children are impressed

customer_reviews.title: Terrible toy. My daughter loved it for about 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible toy. My daughter loved it for about 2 days and now doesn't play with it. All it does is move backwards and forwards and make an "arf arf" sound. For $100??? Holy crap they really took me to the cleaners. Curse you Hasbro. Curse you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The most exciting part about this toy is the fact that it is supposed to work with an app. That app hasn’t been updated in four years. As is, the companion app does not work with the current iOS version. I’ll be returning this toy ASAP. $90 is a bit much for a toy that doesn’t actually work.
customer_reviews.author: Nidia

customer_reviews.title: FurReal Friends are amazing!! This little white dog with pink ribbon ...
customer_reviews.text: FurReal Friends are amazing!! This little white dog with pink ribbon and purple collar is so adorable! Doggy makes cute puppy sounds, wags tail, sits, head changes position when patted and other times as well. Goes for walks, and the little feet move as if they are walking (there are wheels that move the dog, but you cannot see them. ) Dog barks and makes little puppy noises. The kids are in love with this cute little dog!
customer_reviews.author: shopper66

customer_reviews.title: Fun Walking Dog
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for granddaughter and she loves it! Since the dog is on a leash and is "walked" it is more fun than those that simply walk by themselves. Also purchased another for her sister, since she liked it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Grand Mom

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy such expensive toy, not worth the money. Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This dog we opened the box late and realized most of the functions are not working. Due to COVID it’s been so hard to get in touch with Amazon and now it’s past one month so I can’t return this. This is a expensive dog and makes me so upset that it doesn’t function as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie

customer_reviews.title: Cute & adorable, but walking not reliable, also hard
customer_reviews.text: This product is very cute, but not exactly what I expected. It doesn't work as well as expected in walking and it fell down a lot. My granddaughter love it initially, but has long discarded it because it doesn't work as well and can be frustrating when she plays with it. Still very cute and very adorable, but hard when she cuddles it. I gave it 3 stars for the cuteness but not the functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Worked super till it broke :( app doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Head broke off after my daughter hugged it, after one month. There's no seller to contact. I want a replacement. Apparently it's a very old product that was discontinued several years ago and the app doesn't work with any new phones.
customer_reviews.author: Avi Kohn

customer_reviews.title: Cute but doesn't respond as expected
customer_reviews.text: The puppy is very cute and it's great that a child can pretend they're walking a real puppy. As most so called interactive robotic toys this one too doesn't really respond to commands well. It doesn't come towards you when you clap your hands and we've never heard it respond to any speech in any of the expected ways. It does circle through its tricks on its own though. My daughter finds it cute but after the first few hours of excitement she seems to have forgotten about it. I thought she might enjoy walking it when we go to the mall but I'm not sure how that will work out because the dog rolls too slow.
customer_reviews.author: The Incredibles

customer_reviews.title: Just like a real dog, do not swing around by leash
customer_reviews.text: If you act like you are Indiana Jones and repeatedly swing this thing around like it is his bull whip, it's probably going to damage the remote. Otherwise, it works as advertised. I think my child was a little too old or a little too spoiled because this thing doesn't make a lot of appearances in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: target.Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Stop working
customer_reviews.text: The toy is cute but after two months stopped working, we already change batteries and nothing. The dog is not making any noise or walking. My daughter only used it few times, not everyday or without being careful with the toy. She really liked it and I wish I could return it of exchange it but is to late now.
customer_reviews.author: FRANCY

customer_reviews.title: so it's kind of like a car with a dog covering over it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this thing! He drops it all the time, and so far it is still going strong. The bottom has wheels, so it's kind of like a car with a dog covering over it, which I wasn't expecting, but it is still a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Christmas winner!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves this dog, even though I was skeptical at first. My only thought is that it seems to just "sit" a lot. We push the button to make it go, and it will for a few inches, and then it'll sit again. My daughter doesn't seem to mind, but I wonder if we're doing something wrong? The app is good - but I was expecting a lot more interaction with the dog. It's really just a virtual pet environment.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: A hit, except for the app
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my four year old daughter for Christmas. It is one of her favorite presents, as it is interactive and will bark, walk, etc. It is one of the few toys that she is still playing with regularly two weeks later. However, the app that is supposed to work with the puppy does not work on my phone or my husband's. When I try to download it, it stalls and says "waiting for service." He has an iphone and I have a samsung galaxy. It is kind of disappointing, because that was one of the things that made me want to buy it in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: This has essentially no features except going forward where the puppy that her friend brought over had many more fun options. Th
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted this FurReal Friend since her girlfriend had one. This has essentially no features except going forward where the puppy that her friend brought over had many more fun options. This was way overpriced for essentially being a stuffed animal that eats batteries and it too hard to snuggle with in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Cf

customer_reviews.title: Got this as a birthday gift for my best friend's three year old
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a birthday gift for my best friend's three year old. She adores it and couldn't wait to get it out of the packaging. She takes it on walks and cuddles with it, talks to it etc. Only minor downside is it uses C batteries - not something used often so we had to make a special trip to the store for them.
customer_reviews.author: fizzypop

customer_reviews.title: Great first pet
customer_reviews.text: Puppy works well, have not connected to phone app yet but my 2 yr old loves her puppy. Puppy is white so it will collect all the dust and dirt that comes with a floor toy. Definitely keep indoors and requires a cleaner environment as I do not imagine it surviving a real cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: NYAmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Got boring fast
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and entertaining at first... I purchased this 2 years ago and I can't even remember the last time my kids played with it. U press up button on the leash for her to walk and the back button for her to sit down and that's about it. :-( kids did not really care for this toy.
customer_reviews.author: ChristiTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, with instructions
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it came in a brown box...not the normal store display box. But it did come with the instruction sheet, and it looks brand new as described. So all is good. Santa is going to leave it out by the Christmas tree, so no box needed anyway. If giving as a wrapped gift, you may want to order from a place that sells it in the proper display box.
customer_reviews.author: TimeTraveler

customer_reviews.title: The frustration free packaging was awesome! I hate all the packaging involved with kid ...
customer_reviews.text: The frustration free packaging was awesome! I hate all the packaging involved with kid toys. The frustration free packaging was a simple cardboard box with the items inside. Nothing to cut, tear, etc simply open the box and there it is. The toy was a hit with my seven year old daughter. Amazon had the best price by far when I purchased this from Santa. My daughter loves the app and the toy is still being played with over a month later.
customer_reviews.author: Mellisue922

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year-old daughter for Christmas and she loves it. She originally asked for the very expensive Go-Go doggy, but since toys are interchangeable at her age I decided to search for a much cheaper knock-off. I'm so glad I stumbled across this one! She's cute looking and pretty sensitive to sounds so she will make noises or sit if you sneeze at her. I only knocked down a star because she requires the type of batteries you don't tend to have lying around (Ds) and she doesn't turn or change directions on her own (no button to do so), so my daughter has to keep picking her up or lead her.
customer_reviews.author: Demeter

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old likes this 'Dog' but it lacks realism with wheels under its paws (like the old style mechanical ones). She just drags the toy around as the 'controller' isn't very good. Also, the "Talks when you speak to her" doesn't work very well at all. Overall, my 5 year old still likes to play with this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Pacaw 66

customer_reviews.title: Nope! Don’t do it!
customer_reviews.text: This is THE WORST. The puppy has minimal functions (and it doesn’t even perform those well). My 3 year old couldn’t even “walk it” without it falling over or performing some random task. The app DOES NOT work with the toy so trying to set it up is a total waste of time. I would return it but I spilled wine on it while I was trying to pack it! Yep, had to have a glass of wine after realizing how we wasted our money on this foolishness.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Hall

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! NOT REAL PRODUCT!!!! CHEAP KNOCK OFF!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not a real "fur real friend". Doesn't work with the phone app, missing buttons on the controller, NOT at all worth the price. My daughter wanted this so she and her friend could play with theirs together. This was supposed to be the same model but it's a cheap knockoff with the same price tag!
customer_reviews.author: K. H.

customer_reviews.title: my daughter got bored with it after couple days
customer_reviews.text: my daughter got bored with it after couple days. The leash is not long and dog doesn't do much for price. She flipped the switch off and played with the toy in several minutes. After that, she has forgotten about it. My dauther 3 years old , maybe this toy not for her age, she is not interested with dog at all
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Fun Toy for Little Girls. We love it!
customer_reviews.text: My five year old daughter was begging for this dog for Christmas. I obliged and was so glad I did. she loves walking and interacting with her "puppy". We also downloaded the free app for this toy and it is great. My daughter loves to feed her puppy and give it treats from the app. She also really likes that her dog can do tricks. This is a fun toy for young girls and I am impressed with the interactive features.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Martin

customer_reviews.title: These were not available in my area and I needed ...
customer_reviews.text: These were not available in my area and I needed it for a Christmas gift for my niece. The price was very reasonable. It was well packaged and arrived quickly. My niece absolutely loves it! It did everything as described and is holding up well. My niece plays with it a lot and has dropped it a few times, but it has not affected how it works.
customer_reviews.author: HJennings

customer_reviews.title: We also haven't been able to get it follow any simple commands like we thought it did
customer_reviews.text: When you are "taking it on a walk" it takes a really long time to get going again. It sits and barks for awhile, and my child get really frustrated. It's also hard to control where you want it to go. You have to pull on it with a certain angle and strength, which my four year old didn't have the ability to do. We also haven't been able to get it follow any simple commands like we thought it did. Thus, my four year old never plays with.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Romero

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old enjoys her walking puppy but Gets ...
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old enjoys her walking puppy but Gets frustrated with it. It doesn't go completely straight when walking, you have to keep pushing it back on track... Also once you let go of the trigger on the leash the dog stops walking and you have to wait a bit for it to start walking again.
customer_reviews.author: camille

customer_reviews.title: This puppy is like a real puppy.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Birthday gift for my 4 year old daughter. This was an excellent gift. The puppy barks, wags it's tail and kneels like a real puppy. My daughter loves walking her puppy. She named her Bella. It also comes with an App you can download to feed the puppy and other things.
customer_reviews.author: Tiesha S.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my 4 year old daughter. It's cute, but not worth the price. There is quite a delay (due to barking and panting) before the dog actually starts walking forward and this frustrated her. She lost interest quicker than she does with a regular stuffed animal. She loves the gogo pup app though! That has been providing hours of entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy!  Helpful warning: 4 size C Batteries not included with easy packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my daughter wanted. Good quality. Works nicely. We received the easy packaging option. NO BATTERIES are included. I don't have a problem with no batteries, I just wish I'd known in advance that I needed to have 4 size C batteries ready. C batteries are not the most common type. I didn't have any on hand. My daughter was patient, and we got the batteries the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma C

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for any animal lover
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for any animal lover. Walks, barks, and sits like a real puppy. Not recommended for homes with dogs who are jumpy at other dogs, as this can easily be mistaken for a dog and will definitely cause your puppy stress. Other than that, my daughter loves her GoGo Puppy and cares for it like a real dog. She also enjoys the ipad App that goes with it where she can feed and take care of the dog using the app. Great toy and app!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S

customer_reviews.title: perfect for a little girl
customer_reviews.text: don't know what the purpose of this toy is, but my daughter loves it. she downloaded the app on my phone so she can "feed" the dog treats. there's games within the app, so she actually ends up playing on my phone more than with the actual toy. i think if i paid the regular price of $50+ for this toy, i'd be sorely disappointed. at less than $30, "i like it".
customer_reviews.author: HappEgal

customer_reviews.title: Short cord.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, still functions well after 2 years but the cord is short which detracts from walking a dog.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Too Cute to Keep
customer_reviews.text: My sweet dog would not react to me, but my niece came to visit and she displayed her talents. I had to give her away, but I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: ANNIECE ISLER

customer_reviews.title: Cute pup but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: This pup is very cute, but isn't really consistent with its movements. It kind of has a mind of its own when she tries to play with it. I gave it three stars because it is fun to play with, but not all that special of a toy! Might be a good compromise for some parent that doesn't want to buy a real dog just yet!
customer_reviews.author: leslye

customer_reviews.title: Pretty expensive toy that doesnt really do anything cool but ...
customer_reviews.text: This goes in a straight line..does not turn at all, so you have to "turn" it yourself..My daughter was sooo excited for this but doesn't really play with it as it just goes forward in a straight line. Not really interesting, but it does respond if you clap your hands. Pretty expensive toy that doesnt really do anything cool but move forward and bark. Not happy with this purchase, but its cute I guess!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Fake reviews.
customer_reviews.text: The fact that this has so many positive reviews is absolutely fake. This is made cheaply. The battery component asks for 4 1.5V batteries. Well, the component itself makes it impossible to actually place those batteries in and close the compartment. Please don’t be fooled into buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Samir Palavra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The pieces are good. Fast shipping. The handle is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter's fifth birthday, she loves it (our real dog doesn't love it so much haha) very cool how it walks on the leash, she has a blast with it. Happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: AndiG

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This item did not come in a box just a clear plastic bag. It has a few spots where it looked dirty as well. The dog also does not "walk" well. It's supposed to walk with you as you push the button but it does not register at times. My 3 year old basically drags it. I bought it as a Christmas present or else I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy if its a gift!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these for my 2 girls for Christmas and only 1 came in a box. I dont have anything for the other one besides the actual dog and leash, try explaining that to a 5 year old on Christmas morning! If I had time I would send it back, but since christmas is next week I am completely stuck! I should have ordered on Target.com! Now I have to cross my fingers it will work...
customer_reviews.author: M Gabelman

customer_reviews.title: Great substitute for real puppy feel
customer_reviews.text: My one year old loves this thing- a little. It's taking some getting used to but I guess she noticed the mechanical sounds when it moves and that scares her. But she loves to pet it, try to feed it, carry it around and drag it around. This will do until I get her a real puppy!
customer_reviews.author: Juss Tae

customer_reviews.title: She Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Anyone complaining about the packaging did not pay attention when they were ordering. You have a choice that defaults to frustration-free packaging. I chose that, and my daughter did not care: she was happy to not wait for the dog to be freed from a plastic prison! She also loves this toy but it would be more worth the price if it turned. It just goes straight. That is my only knock.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: So much promise, but a little flat and one dimensional. It's cute, and does some stuff, but the leash attaches to the dog's back, so when your kid walks around towing the dog, it falls over and gets dragged along on its side, whimpering and kicking. My daughter doesn't care, of course, but I think it is a little weird. Overall, kind of boring, but it would be much improved if the leash attached to the collar.
customer_reviews.author: ctenidae

customer_reviews.title: one of those toys that you think your daughter will ...
customer_reviews.text: one of those toys that you think your daughter will looove and she doesnt really play with it at all
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: works well and seems to make the kids happy. Plus for the parents is that the bark ...
customer_reviews.text: Even when you have a real dog, every little girl and boy also needs a fake dog that walks and barks. This one is cute, works well and seems to make the kids happy. Plus for the parents is that the bark is not all that loud and annoying.
customer_reviews.author: E Koff

customer_reviews.title: but I am very disappointed. Wouldn't have bought it
customer_reviews.text: Ad never mentioned that there would be no box and it arrived with a plastic bag over its little head. Looks cute, but I am very disappointed. Wouldn't have bought it. I feel this was unfairly advertised and hope my 4 year old granddaughter will be convinced its a good gift and not be disappointed. Expensive for the presentation.
customer_reviews.author: grammie S

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!!
customer_reviews.text: My 4.5 year old daughter has wanted a "Go Go Pup" for Christmas since she first saw one. Her excitement was worth it, and they pup is pretty cool. It has a leash with remote control, follows some voice commands, and there is also an iPhone app that will do some tricks. It was a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: The Dog that Cant!
customer_reviews.text: The remote is difficult to control the movement of this toy😅
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Cute Puppy but no packaging
customer_reviews.text: If it is important that your package comes in the original package then this is not for you. If that does not matter than this is a great deal. Our daughter could care less what kind of box it comes in and to be honest, I prefer to not have to fight with the packaging. Don't forget your batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Ben S

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not great
customer_reviews.text: I am giving it two stars for its cute look but this is not what it is supposed to be. Yes, it does make dog like noises and wags its tail and can sit but to make it walk takes a lot of effort and does not walk for a very long time. It is cute but not as functional as I expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Excellent shopper

customer_reviews.title: 4yr loved for christmas
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 yr old for Christmas and she has absolutely loves it. It works perfectly. The only thing I would change is maybe have 2 button controls, one that makes it walk constantly and one that makes it sit. My daughter wants to continue walking and its programmed to stop and sit every once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna C

customer_reviews.title: Kids approved
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it, she takes it everywhere she goes
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Big hit!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this dog toy. We had purchased a cheap version of this and after it broke in a day my kids were devastated. I'm a cheapskate at heart, but this was a reasonable price for the quality and built to last. Big, big, hit in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Mother and Business Owner

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my 5 year old daughter. She absolutely loves it! I marked that this was a gift, so it came in non-specific boxing. Perfect so she couldn't find this in the garbage after Christmas morning. We put batteries in it and she has been playing with it ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big and little girl loves this toy.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 4 years old and both her and her little sister love this puppy. Specially the little sister is always taking it for a walk and pressing the button. Batteries die really fast. luckily they can still drag it around without it. I do wish it was more gender neutral.
customer_reviews.author: agrdon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so cute ordered for a friends birthday present for their daughter
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: She is pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this toy. It was the top of her wish list. She is pleased with it. I feel like a few more features could have been added to it. Basically it walks (rolls) forwards, sits and barks some. We haven't tried any of the mobile app stuff because she is only 3.
customer_reviews.author: jjackson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought my walking pet for christmas gift and my niece love it, its walking well when your press the button, and its has sounds like a dog. People who see my niece with her pet turn to look it. I suggets dont used in dirty place because its White and it gets dirty easily
customer_reviews.author: Gisella Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: Wish it didn't require an app, but still fun for a little child.
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 4 year old, but it requires a smart phone app to get the full compliment of tricks out of it, thus the 4 star rating. Sit and walk are just about all it will do without the app.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: I love it only wish it came in a brown or black CIA
customer_reviews.text: The first two days she enjoyed playing with it and that was it, it picks up dust easily that sticks to the fur. I think the volume on the pup is too low therefore she not hearing the barks purring and etc. clearly so the appreciation is not there so it wil be regifted or donated.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey M

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Our three-year old granddaughter, who loves animals, loved this dog! It's cute, wags it's tail, barks (but not too loud) and walks along with her. Lost a star because of the price, but she really loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Y Cooney

customer_reviews.title: the family loved it! It's on a leash and walks down ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and made very well made...the family loved it! It's on a leash and walks down the street or across the floor. It barks and makes sounds I would get one for all the little ones. Easy to operate!
customer_reviews.author: lisa whesper

customer_reviews.title: My 4yo loves it, however she gets frustrated she ...
customer_reviews.text: My 4yo loves it, however she gets frustrated she can't make it walk for long periods of time. I wish the remote would allow you to choose to have it walk and walk and walk.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This toy is beyond amazing. Very lifelike. And my daughter loved it! It was her favorite Christmas toy.
customer_reviews.author: Christian A Coerds

customer_reviews.title: Adorable.  Limited Use.
customer_reviews.text: Kids love their new Fur Real friend puppies. Or rather they loved them until they got the rest of their Christmas presents and now the poor puppies are ignored somewhere in the house. But for those two days these were well loved puppies. Worked as stated.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Instant Hit
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves this gift! She was able to pull it right out of the box and use it. The only downfall is they recommend you use an app which I don't agree with.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Cute But...
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money; cheaper on amazon than the store though.It walks 2 ft and you have to go thru a cycle of commands by clicking the little button. My 4 and 8 year Old get very frustrated with it. Cute idea just not good enough.
customer_reviews.author: bellasmommy

customer_reviews.title: 5th birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a gift for my granddaughter's 5th birthday. She had requested this item specifically. She absolutely loves it and is able to get to function as described in the instructions on her own. Seems to be high quality and cute as can be.
customer_reviews.author: Windygran

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Toy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a 5 year old girl. She loves it!!! Toy is excellent quality and sturdy. Definitely would purchase again. I am planning on purchasing more of the FurReal Friends.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Ellen

customer_reviews.title: For the neice
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my niece for Christmas. She loved it. She learned to do all the functions within a couple of hours playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: I Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty cute, my daughter is a bit scared but ...
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty cute, my daughter is a bit scared but she get used when she play outside with the puppy. It is ok tha application from iPad play too. The only thing is that get dirty easy.
customer_reviews.author: Lavinia pop

customer_reviews.title: Great gift and works well
customer_reviews.text: This electronic dog works well. My daughter walked around with it. It can become boring after awhile. It only does a few functions so the entertaining factor wears off. Nice starter though and cost efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Long

customer_reviews.title: cute but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: This is cute but overpriced toy. Got it for my 8 year old for xmas and she played with it for 2 days and then did not look at it again. Best for 5 and younger.
customer_reviews.author: misha e

customer_reviews.title: It was a big hit and her favorite gift. The only thing i have to say ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for Christmas for my goddaughter and she loves it! It was a big hit and her favorite gift. The only thing i have to say is that after a week the bottom fur is already getting dirty. The fur rubs on the floor- due to product design and white fur.
customer_reviews.author: nicky5

customer_reviews.title: Fake Dog at its best!!
customer_reviews.text: So awesome!!! If ever you want your 4 year old to play like they have a dog but not have the mess of a dog in your house this toy is it!!! Just as random as a real dog & fun! App that goes with it is fun too!
customer_reviews.author: A. Oakes

customer_reviews.title: This is a great toy worth investing in
customer_reviews.text: My daughter played with this forever . This is a great toy worth investing in. She never got tired of it at age 5. We bought it for her birthday and for months she still loves it just as much. It makes cute sounds and walks etc.
customer_reviews.author: Beachgirl

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun
customer_reviews.text: This toy has brought our family hours of fun. It's very cute. My daughter loves "walking" it around the house and our little (real) dogs love to bark at it. It takes a little time to learn how to make it do tricks but it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: L. Brewer

customer_reviews.title: ... because it's a large file but the dog is fun for what it is and my daughter enjoys talking ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't do as much as the commercials would lead you to believe and the app that supports the dog takes a long time to load because it's a large file but the dog is fun for what it is and my daughter enjoys talking her for walks.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D. Casar

customer_reviews.title: Just "ok"
customer_reviews.text: The idea is cute. There seems to be a short in it. Sometimes it works; sometimes it doesn't. The sound that the mechanics make is very loud and distracting. Thankfully, my one year old doesn't notice any of these flaws. Very expensive; not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Armymommy

customer_reviews.title: My kids loves loves this toy. Has been playing ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids loves loves this toy. Has been playing with it nonstop for almost a year. Take it to potty and to drink milk. We bought another one for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: lennys

customer_reviews.title: Compromising for a real puppy and worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! She wanted a puppy, we live in a small apartment so this was our compromise. You can also download an app on smart phones and tablets and do more with it. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: the flier isn't super helpful unless you can read
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't come in retail packaging, of course kids don't care, but sometimes they learn a lot about how things work from the package, the flier isn't super helpful unless you can read, still product was perfect, exactly what my daughter had asked for😉
customer_reviews.author: Rettaboo

customer_reviews.title: My favorite part is when you say sit and it sits
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year old grand-niece and she loves it. So does everyone else that sees it in action. My favorite part is when you say sit and it sits! Really a great purchase - worth the money. This was a definite hit.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Conboy

customer_reviews.title: Needs more/better functionality for price
customer_reviews.text: not as great as I was hoping for. 4 year old likes it but doesn't get much use out of the walking function. Needs 2 buttons for forward and back. The one button doesn't seem to work the way the instructions say it should.
customer_reviews.author: krpalmer99

customer_reviews.title: Big hit!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughters birthday gift and she picked this out herself. She loved it. The look on her face when she opened the present was priceless. Always happy to give something that the grandkids will really like and want. Big hit.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Grandma

customer_reviews.title: It does life like things, like eat and drink
customer_reviews.text: This is a neat toy for a little kid. And, it has an app for the iPad to make it even more interactive. It does life like things, like eat and drink. She also needs a bath and attention or she will whine. Great for teaching the responsibilities of having a dog.
customer_reviews.author: Kim B.

customer_reviews.title: ... it for her birthday and it is her new favorite toy. It is very interactive and walks great ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received it for her birthday and it is her new favorite toy. It is very interactive and walks great on a hard floor. It does not walk well on carpet. We took it with us to a store and someone actually thought it was real.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda DePratter

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The packaking was afwul. The box arrived damage and broken.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Viviana

customer_reviews.title: Great on hard floors
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes this but doesn't like how fast it goes through batteries. She likes how it has wheels so she can pull it by the leash
customer_reviews.author: Cindy W.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, the app is great too.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this.. He loves the app that goes with it as well. We cut off the collar and bow and added a cat collar because it was for my son. Looks more like a boys dog now.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Very adorable and somewhat cuddly (even with the battery compartment
customer_reviews.text: A huge hit with my 4 and 6 year-old nieces! Very adorable and somewhat cuddly (even with the battery compartment.) Didn't try the app yet, but it looks promising. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Leffler

customer_reviews.title: I think it is a good toy for younger kids
customer_reviews.text: Even though my daughter loves dogs, she wasn't very impressed with this one... She doesn't play with it... I think it is a good toy for younger kids ... maybe around 3 to 5 years old maximum, not more...
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately, I got this on sale
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately, I got this on sale. Our 4 year old does play with it. She isn't aware that this pet can be synced with my phone and she's perfectly satisfied. I wish it turned instead of only going straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Loyola

customer_reviews.title: Great value and adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this toy for my 18 month old niece. She loved it. Very cute and well made. Super soft. Easy to use and great value. Only downfall is that it only rolls forward in a straight line and tips over easily. I recommend this toy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sandybeach

customer_reviews.title: Happy with our new puppy
customer_reviews.text: Cute, playful, not annoying or too loud. She does tip over easily, but it doesn't seem to bother our little girl at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Terzich

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: Super cute toy. Great for a first puppy or for any child who loves pets and fun. Interactive and super sweet. Only downside is that it takes 4 C batteries....
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment: missing box!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed that this product did not come in the box as advertised!! It came in a plan brown box wrapped in plastic!! My daughter was not as excited to get it because of the missing box!! Not even sure if it works right... Debating on returning item!
customer_reviews.author: rmorris

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed with this toy!
customer_reviews.text: I received this toy in a brown box and wrapped in plastic. I figured for the price I got it for, this was ok. I should have known better... on Christmas morning, my 3 1/2 year old daughter opened this gift and was so excited. We went to put the batteries in and there it was... no battery pack top, which means the toy will not work without it. I had a very upset little girl. I just had to explain to her that sometimes toys come to us broken and we have to send them to the toy hospital. VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Giaconia

product_meta.title: FurReal friends Get Up & GoGo My Walkin’ Pup Pet
product_meta.description:
FURREAL FRIENDS GET UP AND GOGO MY WALKIN PLUSH PUP PET 
View larger FURREAL FRIENDS GET UP & GOGO, MY WALKIN' PUP
FurReal Friends plush pets are all about rich, life-like pet experiences! Their exciting, engaging, and interactive play help to encourage caregiving, forge lifelong friendships, and create unforgettable memories! Get ready to show off Get Up & GoGo, My Walkin' Pup pet when you walk her using her leash controller. She's so adorable with her poseable head and wagging tail, you may want to take here everywhere you go!




Walks with Attached Leash ControllerView larger TAKE HER FOR A WALK WITH HER LEASH CONTROLLER
All eyes will be on you when you take Get Up & GoGo, My Walkin’ Pup pet for a walk! Press the button on her leash controller and watch her go. Press and hold the button and she'll keep on walking with you. When you’re ready to rest, pet Get Up & GoGo, My Walkin’ Pup pet on her head and she’ll sit until you’re ready to play some more! There are many different ways to have fun playing with Get Up & GoGo, My Walkin’ Pup. You can even play games with her through the free FurReal Friends app. She’ll respond to the many activities in adorable ways!

Sits, Wags Tail, and Holds Leash in Her MouthView larger PET HER AND TALK TO HER -- SHE’LL MOVE AND TALK BACK TO YOU
FurReal Friends Get Up & GoGo, My Walkin' Pup pet is more than an adorable walking partner. She’ll sit when you pet her head and when you talk to her she’ll talk back to you in her sweet puppy language. Get Up & GoGo, My Walkin’ Pup pet wags her tail and will even talk back and forth with her FurReal Friends pal, Pom Pom, My Baby Panda (sold separately), each with their own sweet pet sounds! Now there’s a free FurReal Friends app for you to download and play in many more ways with Get Up & GoGo, My Walkin’ Pup. When you keep her close to you, she will play along and respond in adorable ways to the many app activities that you play. With Get Up & GoGo, My Walkin’ Pup, you can have the best day ever!

Responds to Your Voice and Talks Back with Sweet Puppy SoundsView larger SHE'S THE STAR OF THE NEW FREE FURREAL FRIENDS APP
FurReal Friends has a new, free app, and Get Up & GoGo, My Walkin’ Pup is the star! Sit her beside you, face the mobile device toward her, and watch her interact with the app activities you play! Get Up & GoGo, My Walkin’ Pup pet will respond to the bubbles and hair dryer in one of the app activities. In the feeding app activity, she’ll let you know what treats she likes and doesn’t like. There are many app activities to play with her in a variety of ways! The FurReal Friends app is also a great way to meet other FurReal Friends pets, including Cuddles, My Giggly Monkey, Pom Pom, My Baby Panda, and Butterscotch, My Walkin' Pony. The seven featured pet friends will even perform for you in their FurReal Friends app band! Mobile device not included.

View larger INCLUDES
Get Up & GoGo, My Walkin' Pup pet with attached remote control leash.

View larger HIGHLIGHTS
1. Walk her using her attached leash controller 2. She sits when you pet the top of her head 3. She responds to your voice with sweet puppy sounds 4. She talks back and forth with FurReal Friends Pom Pom, My Baby Panda (item #A7275, sold separately) 5. She is the star of the new, free FurReal Friends app

View larger CORPORATE SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY
Hasbro is committed to being an ethical and responsible company and is a recognized toy industry leader in the areas of product safety, environmental sustainability, ethical sourcing and philanthropy.
feature_bullets: Plush, electronic puppy acts like a real pup
Leash controller lets you move her the way you want
Pet walks, wags her tail, sits, tilts her head
Pet responds with barks when you talk to her.
Includes Get Up And Gogo My Walkin' Pup pet and instructions.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,095 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
